00025 #pragma once
00026 
00027 #include <l4/sys/types.h>
00028 #include <l4/re/rm-sys.h>
00029 
00030 #include <l4/re/util/region_mapping>
00031 
00032 namespace L4Re { namespace Util {
00033 
00034 template<typename Rm_server, typename RM, typename IOS>
00035 int region_map_server(RM *rm, IOS &ios)
00036 {
00037   L4::Opcode op;
00038   ios >> op;
00039   switch (op)
00040     {
00041       case Rm_::Attach:
00042     {
00043       unsigned long size;
00044       l4_addr_t start;
00045       unsigned long flags;
00046       l4_cap_idx_t client_cap_idx = L4_INVALID_CAP;
00047       L4::Ipc::Snd_fpage ds_cap;
00048       typename Rm_server::Dataspace ds = typename Rm_server::Dataspace();
00049       l4_addr_t offs;
00050       unsigned char align;
00051 
00052       ios >> start >> size >> flags >> offs >> align;
00053       if (!(flags & Rm::Reserved))
00054         {
00055     ios >> client_cap_idx >> ds_cap;
00056 
00057     if (int r = Rm_server::validate_ds(ds_cap, flags, &ds))
00058       return r;
00059         }
00060 
00061       size  = l4_round_page(size);
00062       start = l4_trunc_page(start);
00063 
00064       if (size < L4_PAGESIZE)
00065         return -L4_EINVAL;
00066 
00067       unsigned r_flags = flags & Rm::Region_flags;
00068       unsigned a_flags = flags & Rm::Attach_flags;
00069 
00070       start = l4_addr_t(rm->attach((void*)start, size,
00071         typename RM::Region_handler(ds, client_cap_idx, offs, r_flags),
00072         a_flags, align));
00073 
00074       if (start == L4_INVALID_ADDR)
00075         return -L4_EADDRNOTAVAIL;
00076 
00077       ios << start;
00078       return L4_EOK;
00079     }
00080       case Rm_::Detach:
00081     {
00082       l4_addr_t addr;
00083       unsigned long size;
00084       unsigned flags;
00085       ios >> addr >> size >> flags;
00086 
00087       Region r;
00088       typename RM::Region_handler h;
00089       int err = rm->detach((void*)addr, size, flags, &r, &h);
00090       if (err < 0)
00091         return err;
00092 
00093       if (r.invalid())
00094         return -L4_ENOENT;
00095 
00096       ios << l4_addr_t(r.start()) << (unsigned long)r.size()
00097           << h.client_cap_idx();
00098 
00099       return err;
00100     }
00101       case Rm_::Attach_area:
00102     {
00103       l4_addr_t start;
00104       unsigned long size;
00105       unsigned flags;
00106       unsigned char align;
00107 
00108       ios >> start >> size >> flags >> align;
00109       start = rm->attach_area(start, size, flags, align);
00110       if (start == L4_INVALID_ADDR)
00111         return -L4_EADDRNOTAVAIL;
00112 
00113       ios << start;
00114 
00115       return L4_EOK;
00116     }
00117       case Rm_::Detach_area:
00118     {
00119       l4_addr_t start;
00120       ios >> start;
00121       if (!rm->detach_area(start))
00122         return -L4_ENOENT;
00123 
00124       return L4_EOK;
00125     }
00126       case Rm_::Find:
00127     {
00128       if (!Rm_server::Have_find)
00129         return -L4_EPERM;
00130 
00131       l4_addr_t addr;
00132             unsigned flag_area = 0;
00133       unsigned long size;
00134       ios >> addr >> size;
00135 
00136       typename RM::Node r = rm->find(Region(addr, addr + size -1));
00137       if (!r)
00138               {
00139                 r = rm->area_find(Region(addr, addr + size - 1));
00140                 if (!r)
00141             return -L4_ENOENT;
00142                 flag_area = Rm::In_area;
00143               }
00144 
00145       addr = r->first.start();
00146       size = r->first.end() + 1 - addr;
00147 
00148       unsigned flags = r->second.flags() | flag_area;
00149 
00150       ios << addr << size << flags << r->second.offset()
00151           << Rm_server::find_res(r->second.memory());
00152 
00153       return L4_EOK;
00154     }
00155       case Rm_::Get_regions:
00156     {
00157       l4_addr_t addr;
00158       ios >> addr;
00159       typename RM::Node r;
00160       int num = 0;
00161       while ((r = rm->lower_bound(Region(addr, addr +1))))
00162         {
00163     Rm::Region x;
00164     x.start  = r->first.start();
00165     x.end    = r->first.end();
00166     x.offset = r->second.offset();
00167 
00168     if (!ios.put(x))
00169       break;
00170 
00171     num++;
00172     if (x.end >= rm->max_addr())
00173       break;
00174     addr = x.end + 1;
00175         }
00176 
00177       return num;
00178     }
00179       case Rm_::Get_areas:
00180     {
00181       l4_addr_t addr;
00182       ios >> addr;
00183       typename RM::Node r;
00184       int num = 0;
00185       while ((r = rm->lower_bound_area(Region(addr, addr +1))))
00186         {
00187     Rm::Area x;
00188     x.start  = r->first.start();
00189     x.end    = r->first.end();
00190 
00191     if (!ios.put(x))
00192       break;
00193 
00194     num++;
00195     if (x.end >= rm->max_addr())
00196       break;
00197     addr = x.end + 1;
00198         }
00199 
00200       return num;
00201     }
00202       default:
00203   return -L4_ENOSYS;
00204     }
00205 }
00206 
00207 template<typename Dbg, typename RM, typename IOS>
00208 int region_pf_handler(RM *rm, IOS &ios)
00209 {
00210   l4_umword_t addr, pc, sp;
00211   ios >> addr >> pc >> sp;
00212   Dbg(Dbg::Server).printf("page fault: %lx pc=%lx\n", addr, pc);
00213 
00214   register unsigned writable = addr & 2;
00215   addr = addr & ~3UL;
00216 
00217   typename RM::Node n = rm->find(addr);
00218 
00219   if (!n || !n->second.memory())
00220     {
00221       Dbg(Dbg::Warn, "rm").printf("unhandled %s page fault @%lx pc=%lx\n",
00222                                   writable ? "write" : "read", addr, pc);
00223 
00224       // generate exception
00225       ios << (l4_umword_t)~0;
00226       return L4_EOK;
00227     }
00228 
00229   if (n->second.is_ro() && writable)
00230     {
00231       Dbg(Dbg::Warn, "rm").printf("write page fault in readonly region @%lx pc=%lx\n",
00232                                   addr, pc);
00233       // generate exception
00234       ios << (l4_umword_t)~0;
00235       return L4_EOK;
00236     }
00237 
00238   typename RM::Region_handler::Ops::Map_result result;
00239   if (int err = n->second.map(addr, n->first, writable, &result))
00240     {
00241       Dbg(Dbg::Warn, "rm").printf("mapping for page fault failed with %d @%lx pc=%lx\n",
00242                                   err, addr, pc);
00243       // generate exception
00244       ios << (l4_umword_t)~0;
00245       return L4_EOK;
00246     }
00247 
00248   ios << result;
00249   return L4_EOK;
00250 }
00251 
00252 }}
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
